name: Coldplay
bio: Coldplay is a British rock band known for integrating sustainability practices into their tours.

name: Billie Eilish
bio: Billie Eilish has publicly advocated for climate awareness and uses eco-friendly tour setups.

name: Radiohead
bio: Radiohead has been a long-time critic of environmental neglect in the music industry.

name: Ed Sheeran
bio: Ed Sheeran offsets tour emissions by planting trees and reducing single-use plastics.

name: Imagine Dragons
bio: Imagine Dragons is experimenting with greener logistics on tour and energy-efficient setups.
